components.Autopay.merchant_list_title: Explore Popular Merchants on the Lightning Network
components.Autopay.search_no_Results: Your search did not return any results.
components.Autopay.subtitle: Frictionless digital payments
components.Autopay.success_text: You can change your Limit or turn off autopay anytime. Enjoy.

components.Channels.ChannelsMenu.title: Channels
components.Channels.base_fee_description: The required number of {cryptoUnitName} per kilo-weight that the requester will pay at all times, for both the funding transaction and commitment transaction.
components.Channels.channel_activity_des: The total percent of sent + received funds divided by the total capacity of the channel. A channel with activity over 100% means that the total amount of sent + received funds exceeds the total capacity of the channel. This metric is designed to show how effective a given channel is.
components.Channels.close_channel_dialog: I understand this is an irreversible action

Are you sure you want to force close this channel? By performing an uncooperative close (force close), your funds will be locked for {csvDelay, plural, zero {0 blocks} one {1 block} other {{csvDelay} blocks}} before being spendable again in your wallet.
Are you sure you want to close this channel?
components.Channels.closing_transaction_: The transaction that closed this channel, as recorded in the blockchain. You can click the link on the right to view this transaction in a block explorer.
components.Channels.commit_fee_descripti: The amount to be paid in fees for the current set of commitment transactions.
components.Channels.csv_delay_descriptio: In the event of an uncooperative close (force close) of this channel, the time lock is the number of blocks you will have to wait before you can claim your funds again.
components.Channels.csv_delay_value: {csvDelay, plural, zero {0 blocks} one {1 block} other {{csvDelay} blocks}}
components.Channels.funding_date_descrip: Channel funding transaction date and time.
components.Channels.funding_transaction_: The transaction that opened this channel, as recorded in the blockchain. You can click the link on the right to view this transaction in a block explorer.
components.Channels.local_chan_reserve_s: The minimum satoshis this node is required to reserve in its balance.
components.Channels.no_search_results: Your search did not return any results.
components.Channels.node_search_descript: Search for nodes by name, public key, or paste their pubkey@host
components.Channels.node_search_form_des: Open channels to other nodes on the network to start using the Lightning Network.
components.Channels.num_updates_descript: The total number of updates within this channel.
components.Channels.open_channel_form_de: To open a channel, enter the desired node's publickey@host, set the amount of BTC you'd like to commit to the channel, and submit.
components.Channels.remote_chan_reserve_: The minimum satoshis the other node is required to reserve in its balance.
components.Channels.total_received_descr: The total value you've received within this channel.
components.Channels.total_sent_descripti: The total value you've sent within this channel.
components.Form.lnd_connection_string_pl: Paste an Lnd Connect URI or BTCPay Server config here
components.Form.payreq_placeholder: Paste a Lightning Payment Request or {chain} Address here

components.Home.neutrinoUrl_tooltip: Connect only to the specified peers at startup. Each URL must start from new line.
components.Home.no_active_wallet_message: Please select a wallet from the wallets menu.
components.Home.no_wallets_message: Unfortunately you don’t have any wallets 😢
components.Home.wallet_settings_alias_de: The alias is visible to others on the network.
components.Home.wallet_settings_name_des: The wallet name is only visible to you inside Zap.
components.Login.error_desc_darwin: Mac OS Keychain is not available. It is required to start Zap wallet.
components.Login.error_desc_linux: Gnome Keyring is not available. It might not be installed or the process is not running. Please ensure it's installed and running and restart the app
components.Login.error_desc_win32: Windows Credential Manager is not available. It is required to start Zap wallet.
components.Onboarding.Steps.alias_descri: Set your node alias to help others connect with you on the Lightning Network
components.Onboarding.Steps.autopilot_de: Autopilot is an automatic network manager. Instead of manually adding people to build your network to make payments, enable autopilot to automatically connect you to the Lightning Network using 60% of your balance.
components.Onboarding.Steps.backup_path_: Channel backups will be stored here
components.Onboarding.Steps.cert_descrip: Path to the lnd tls cert. Example: /path/to/tls.cert
components.Onboarding.Steps.components.e: The following error has ocurred when creating a wallet:
The following error has occurred when recovering a wallet:
components.Onboarding.Steps.components.s: Recovering a wallet without your channel backup file can lead to loss of funds in the event that you need to restore from seed.
I do not want to recover channel funds

Not setting up your channel backup means the file will only live locally in your Zap data directory. If this file is damaged or lost, it can lead to loss of funds in the event that you need to restore from seed.
I do not want to set up my channel backup
components.Onboarding.Steps.confirm_conn: Confirm the connection details for your Lightning node.
components.Onboarding.Steps.connection_d: Create a new Lightning enabled Bitcoin wallet
Enter the connection details for your Lightning node.
components.Onboarding.Steps.connection_t: How will you connect to the Lightning Network?
components.Onboarding.Steps.connection_u: Paste the full content of your BTCPay Server connection config file. This can be found by clicking the link entitled 'Click here to open the configuration file' in your BTCPay Server gRPC settings.
Paste an Lnd Connect URI. You can generate one of these using the lndconnect utility. Example: "lndconnect://1.2.3.4:10009?cert=x&macaroon=y"
components.Onboarding.Steps.create_walle: Set a password to encrypt your wallet. This password will be needed to unlock Zap in the future.
components.Onboarding.Steps.default_desc: By selecting the default mode we will do everything for you. Just click and go!
components.Onboarding.Steps.hostname_des: Hostname and port of the Lnd gRPC interface. Example: localhost:10009
components.Onboarding.Steps.import_descr: Recovering a wallet, nice. You don't need anyone else, you got yourself :)
components.Onboarding.Steps.importing_wa: Please wait whilst we start the wallet import process. This should only take a moment.
components.Onboarding.Steps.login_descri: Please enter your wallet password to unlock it.
components.Onboarding.Steps.macaroon_des: Path to the lnd macaroon file. Example: /path/to/admin.macaroon
components.Onboarding.Steps.network_desc: Select the network your wallet will be connected to
components.Onboarding.Steps.network_main: Connect to the live Bitcoin network and use real funds.
components.Onboarding.Steps.network_test: Experiment with test bitcoin that has no monetary value.
components.Onboarding.Steps.network_warn: WARNING: You may lose your funds. Mainnet support is experimental and has not been thoroughly tested. Use Testnet to experiment without risk.
components.Onboarding.Steps.passphrase_d: Your seed is encrypted. Please enter the passphrase that you set when creating the wallet.
components.Onboarding.Steps.password_des: You would have set your password when first creating your wallet. This is separate from your 24 word seed.
components.Onboarding.Steps.password_err: Password must be at least {passwordMinLength} characters long
components.Onboarding.Steps.retype_seed_: If you lose your seed you'll have no way to recover your wallet. To make sure that you have properly saved your seed, please retype words {word1}, {word2} & {word3}
components.Onboarding.Steps.save_seed_de: This will allow you to recover your wallet.
components.Onboarding.Steps.seed_warning: Keep this private! If someone gains access to this list they can steal your money.
components.Onboarding.Steps.signup_descr: Would you like to create a new wallet or import an existing one?
components.Onboarding.Steps.verify_host_: Are you sure you want to connect to {hostName}?
components.Onboarding.Steps.wallet_name_: This is for your convenience only and will not be broadcasted on the Lightning Network.
components.Pay.description: Paste a Lightning Payment Request or a {chain} address in the field below to send {chain} ({ticker}) through the Lightning Network or make an On-Chain Transaction.

components.Profile.ProfilePaneConnect.ln: Node URI key has been copied to your clipboard
This QR Code can be used to connect other devices to your lnd node. It can be used with Zap iOS and Zap Android and any other wallet that supports the lndconnect standard.
Keep this private! If someone gains access to this QR Code they can steal your money.
components.Profile.ProfilePaneNodeInfo.n: Node pubkey (short for public key) is the public address of your node. This is your unique identifier, generated from your seed.
components.Profile.ProfilePaneNodeInfo.p: Node public key has been copied to your clipboard
components.Profile.ProfilePaneSignMessag: Sign arbitrary messages to prove that you are in control of the node's public key. Signed message can be independently verified by the people you hand the message to.
Signature has been copied to your clipboard
Message to sign with node's private key.
components.Profile.ProfilePaneVerifyMess:
Verify a signature over a message. The signature must be zbase32 encoded and signed
  by an active node in the resident node's channel database. In addition to returning the
  validity of the signature, recovered pubkey from the signature is displayed.
Pubkey has been copied to your clipboard
Unable to verify the signature. Signature may be incorrect or signer is not in the node's channel database.
Signature is valid. Signer pubkey recovered from the signature:
Enter a message that you would like to verify the authenticity of.
The signature to be verified over the given message.
